name: Harley D. Eades III
content: Harley Eades III Toggle navigation Harley Eades III Home Publications Talks Blog Github Harley Eades III Welcome! I am an Associate Professor in the School of Computer and Cyber Sciences at Augusta University. Cl√©ment Aubert and I run the ForML Lab. On this page you will find my research interests, contact information, and CV (Updated May 2022). Current Projects Designing new tools for developers with vision impairments. Designing new systems for remote coaching of athletic training: from novice to elite athletes. The Granule Project where I am studying graded logics, models, and type theories. Research interests Keywords: HCI, design, visualization, sports+HCI, formal methods, Programming languages, type theory, category theory, and logic in computer science. ACM Classes AMS Classes Conference and workshop service Co-chair for TyDe 2022 Program committee member for ICFP 2021 coChair for GraMSec 2020 Program committee member for LINEARITY && TLLA 2020 coChair for SERPL 2019 Program committee member for GraMSec 2019 Program committee member for GraMSec 2018 Program committee member for GraMSec 2017 Program committee member for PLPV 2013 Contact Information Office: University Hall Mastodon Email: harley.eades@gmail.com All rights reserved: Harley Eades III.
